column4: Hey guys, no compiz animations are working on gnome classic on 11.10. i've got nvidia-proprietry installed and activated so i've def got 3d going...any ideas? have CCSM installed and have a few keyboard shortcuts turned on (such as enhanced zoom desktop) but when i use it nothing happens. I can switch between desktops fine using the shortcuts but no animations
Didn't classic have some option to enable desktop effects? Got 'em turned on?
I haven't seen one. Any ideas where it'd be if it existed? reisio ccsm = compizconfig-settings-manager
It used to be in the appearance preferences in the visual effects tab
